name: FPS Caster Prototype
description:
This game is a desktop game meant to be played with a controller. Mouse and keyboard will work, but using an xbox or playstation controller via bluetooth or usb will be much better.

The object of the current state of the game is to kill enemies. They will respawn so you can keep killing them as much as you want.

TO PLAY: 

Download the zip folder, extract everything and run the .exe titled "FPS Caster Prototype.exe"

CONTROLS:

  • Movement - Left Stick/WASD
  • Looking - Right Stick/Mouse Movement
  • Cast Spell - Right Trigger/Left Click
  • Sprint - Left Trigger/Left Shift
  • Jump - Y or Triangle/Spacebar
  • Exit Game - Start/Escape
